title: Understanding Row Titles
text: Row titles help organize data in a structured manner, making it easier to read and understand.

title: Benefits of Indenting
text: Indenting row titles can create a visual hierarchy, similar to an outline or table of contents.

hintAnswer: it can result in a hierarchy of row titles, like in an outline or table of contents
title: Why enter and indent row titles?
text: What is the main reason for entering and indenting row titles?
choices: it can result in a hierarchy of row titles, like in an outline or table of contents
it can improve the readability of the worksheet
it looks more professional in work settings
